post.author: 이성기
post.content:
The big items here seem to be:
1) Java Server Faces (now released, vs. beta in 5.1.1)
2) IBM Enterprise Generation Language (4GL . . . design/build database access application without writing Java code!) ==> 이거, 살펴보아야 겠음.
3) IBM WebSphere Portal Test Environment
post.title: Big items in WebSphere Studio 5.1.2.
